item.title: mosh: Did not find mosh server startup message
item.description:
Mac使用mosh登录新的服务器，发现如下错误：

bash: warning: setlocale: LC_ALL: cannot change locale (en_US.UTF-8) The locale requested by LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 isn’t available here. Running `locale-gen en_US.UTF-8’ may be necessary.

The locale requested by LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 isn’t available here. Running `locale-gen en_US.UTF-8’ may be necessary.
